lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Frederic S. The Graduate Center, CUNY, deeply mourns the loss of Frederic S. Papert, who served on the Board of Visitors and was a long-tenured trustee of the Graduate Center Foundation. Fred's commitment to raising visibility for and supporting the Graduate Center was unparalleled. We are grateful that he chose to focus his philanthropic efforts on public education, and send heartfelt condolences to his family. Chase F. Robinson, President, The Graduate Center Frances Degen Horowitz, President Emerita Craig Kaplan, Chairman, Graduate Center Foundation Jay Golan, Executive Director 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PAPERT, FREDERIC S
